I like to watch people program on twitch. Seeing people suffer with code reminds me that I am not alone.

I may be missing a few, so I will add them onto this list as I find them.

In no particular order, here the ones I've watched recently:

+------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Streamer                                                   | Content                                                                              | Linux User?                                            | Misc Notes                                                                         |
+============================================================+======================================================================================+========================================================+====================================================================================+
| [het_tanis](https://www.twitch.tv/het_tanis)               | Teaches linux, k8s devops, and ansible related things on stream.                     | In vm's, but not on bare metal.                        | Killercoda courses can be found [here](https://killercoda.com/het-tanis)           |
+------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| [cidermcdread](https://www.twitch.tv/cidermcdread)         | Various games, old school runescape, path of exile.                                  | Nixos                                                  | Also discusses philosophical and political topics in a very engaging manner        |

| [chrissiecodes](https://www.twitch.tv/chrissiecodes)       | Python development, often for stream related features                                | Ubuntu in WSL                                          | Very active and knowledgable chat which is fun to be in.                           |

| [trshpuppy](https://www.twitch.tv/trshpuppy)               | python, javascript, and CTF's/hacking                                                | Windows, but Kali in a VM                              |                                                                                    |
